name: Home (itch) (Mx3mad)
description:
A Maze Horror Game

My Submission for Jame gam #16

Maze Generator & renderer: https://github.com/gamedolphin/youtube_unity_maze

First Person Controller + Cinemachine: Unity's Starter Assets - First Person Character Controller

Minimap: Brackeys -> https://github.com/Brackeys/Minimap

Enemy's Navigation: Brackeys -> https://github.com/Brackeys/NavMesh-Tutorial

Footsteps SFX: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/sound-fx/footstep-snow-and-grass-906...

Anime girl: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/characters/humanoids/anime-x-mas-girl-1...

Monster: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/characters/creatures/character-monster-...

SkyBox: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/textures-materials/sky/urban-night-sky-...

Other SFX:

  - https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/ambient/ambient-horror-sound-fx-free...

  - https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/sound-fx/monster-sfx-111518-132868
